item.description:
Join your fellow Inquisitives for an evening of book browsing, a warm beverage at the Cafe Zing , and then a fun informal discussion and hanging out with friends over a bite to eat at Christopher's beginning at 7 pm. Reservations will be for the upstairs portion of Christophers's





We'll meet at the Porter Square Books, right in Porter Square (next to the Shaws supermarket). After checking out books, we'll head across the street to Christopher's for dinner.

Note the Cafe Zing is just inside the bookstore entrance on the left.

Porter Square Books

Info on Christopher's
item.how_to_find_us: Look for us towards the back of the store near the round table, Arrive at Christopher's at 7 pm.
item.name: Christopher's
